to.note: Shinespark and XRayClimb have a direct link. Other strats should go 1 -> 4 -> 2.
Shinespark and XRayClimb have a direct link. Other strats should go 1 -> 4 -> 2 -> 3.
The heat frames for these strats assumes you've already fallen from the door, because the cost is already baked into the subsequent 5-> 3 heat costs when relevant.

strats.name: Leave With Side Platform
note: If using the full runway, turn around from the corner rather than backing into it.

strats.name: Come in Shinecharged, Shinespark
note: Enter shinecharged, ideally with a low spin jump through the door.

strats.name: Direct Jump with Screw Attack
note: Jump through the lowest part of the door to enter with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw Attack.

strats.name: Direct Jump with Speed Booster
note: Jump through the lowest part of the door to enter with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks using SpeedBooster.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (HiJump, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Wall Jump, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump, Screw Attack)
note: To get up most quickly, after using Screw Attack to break up through the bomb blocks, use the next bomb blocks as a platform.

strats.name: Left-Side X-Ray Climb (to Top Door)
strats.note: Climb up 2 screens.
devNote: FIXME: The heatFrames for this and almost all other heated X-ray climbs are much too loose.

strats.name: G-Mode, Screw Attack
strats.note: Screw Attack through the bomb blocks before exiting G-mode above.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Shoot the Item
note: Enter the room in Direct G-mode, with the item uncollected.
Shoot the Chozo ball to overload PLMs then climb the room.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Bomb the Item
note: Enter the room in Direct G-mode, with the item uncollected.
Bomb the Chozo ball to overload PLMs then IBJ to the top.

strats.name: Side Platform Jump with Blue Speed

note: This applies to Warehouse Entrance.
This applies to Dust Torizo Room and Halfie Climb Room.
This applies to Noob Bridge and Halfie Climb Room.
Use a 2-tap in order to gain blue speed with high momentum.
detailNote: A lower speed of $3.1 can work, but it is recommended to instead do a double-stutter 2-tap with an early second tap,
to more reliably gain a speed of $3.3 or higher, in order to get a shorter jump.
The specific speed $3.2 does not work as Samus will not quite get high enough to break the blocks.

note: This applies to Flyway.
This applies to Baby Kraid Room.
Perform a ceiling mockball through the transition,
and unmorph after the transition to avoid bonking on the overhang.
This applies to Metal Pirates Room.
Jump into the room with blue speed, using it to break some of the bomb blocks above.
devNote: FIXME: A similar strat from 1 to 2 would also be possible,
saving some heat frames by going directly to the middle door instead of stopping at the item.

strats.name: Direct Jump with Screw Attack
note: Jump through the lowest part of the door to enter with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw Attack.

strats.name: Direct Jump with Speed Booster
note: Jump through the lowest part of the door to enter with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks using SpeedBooster.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up half a screen.

strats.name: G-Mode, Screw Attack
strats.note: Screw Attack through the bomb blocks before exiting G-mode above.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Bomb the Blocks
strats.note: Bomb the blocks before exiting G-mode and jumping through.
devNote: FIXME: If Bombs are available (vs. Power Bombs), it's not necessary to break all the bottom blocks.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode, Shoot the Item
note: Enter the room in Direct G-mode, with the item uncollected.
Shoot the Chozo ball to overload PLMs then climb the room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Temporary Blue)
note: In the previous room, press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.
Maintain the temporary blue state to break through the blocks at the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Screw Attack)
G-Mode, Screw Attack
strats.note: Screw Attack through the bomb blocks before exiting G-mode below.

strats.name: Power Bomb Top Blocks
note: Jump and lay a Power Bomb mid-air, to break the top bomb blocks.
With a quick mid-air morph, the Power Bomb can be laid from within the top tile of the doorway;
alternatively, Samus can jump away from the doorway and lay it higher.
devNote: The heat frames include time for the Power Bomb explosion to progress far enough
to not interfere with pausing for a spring ball jump afterward.

strats.name: Springwall with Bombs
note: Use a wall jump into spring ball jump to break one of the bomb blocks above.
Then land back in the doorway.

strats.name: Carry G-Mode Morph Back Through
strats.devNote: Artificial morph will allow Samus not to fall; real Morph is not sufficient.

strats.name: Doorway Speedy Jump
strats.note: Position yourself in the door way, then run and jump. Makes it possible to walljump up.

strats.name: Doorway Spring Ball Jump
note: It may help to disable HiJump first and then re-equip it with the springball jump.
Doing this, the springball jump may be buffered.

strats.name: Doorway CWJ
strats.note: Position Samus in the doorway a few pixels from the edge. Dashing stationary spinjump into a delayed CWJ and hopefully catch the upper ledge with a walljump.

strats.name: Transition Screw Jump
strats.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

strats.name: Transition Screw Jump (Tricky Jump)
strats.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

strats.name: Transition Screw Jump (No Walljump)
strats.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

strats.name: Transition Screw Jump (Tricky Dash Jump)
strats.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.
devNote: FIXME: Add option(s) to break the blocks with Screw Attack and then fall down.

strats.name: Jump into Room Shinespark
note: Jump into the room and spark diagonally once above the center of the door vertically.
Or diagonally spark anywhere that is not the bottom of the door in the previous room.
strats.devNote: TODO: Sparking diagonally through the door cannot be shown as an alternative.

strats.name: Cross Room Blue Speed Jump with Hi-Jump
note: Jump into the room with blue speed.
Morph and unmorph to clear Samus' horizontal momentum while retaining blue,
to break the right-most bomb blocks above and reach the top of the room.
devNote: Higher run speeds can also work, but with greater difficulty.

strats.name: Cross Room Blue Speed Jump
note: Jump into the room with blue speed and a specific amount of horizontal momentum, morphing through the transition.
Unmorph to clear Samus' horizontal momentum while retaining blue,
to break the right-most bomb blocks above and reach the top of the room.
detailNote: It can help to pause buffer the morph:
time a pause to hit just after Samus jumps and aims down,
then hold down during the unpause black screen to buffer the morph.
devNote: Higher run speeds could also work, but with greater difficulty.

strats.name: Cross Room Very Slow Blue Speed Jump with Hi-Jump and Wall Jump
note: Jump into the room with blue speed and very low horizontal momentum,
to break the left-most bomb block above and wall jump up.

strats.name: Side Platform Blue Speed Jump

note: This applies to Dust Torizo Room and Noob Bridge.
This applies to Noob Bridge.
This applies to Double Chamber.
This applies to Below Botwoon Energy Tank and Botwoon Energy Tank Room.
detailNote: Gain run speed, and time a pause to hit after Samus jumps and aims down;
then unequip Gravity and buffer the morph while unpausing.

note: This applies to Botwoon Energy Tank Room.
detailNote: Gain run speed, and time a pause to hit after Samus jumps and aims down;
then unequip Gravity and buffer the morph while unpausing.

note: This applies to Metroid Room 1, Statues Hallway, and Baby Kraid Room.
This applies to Blue Brinstar Energy Tank Room, Bowling Alley (middle, power off), and Basement (power on).
This applies to Metal Pirates Room.
This applies to Flyway.
Jump into the room morphing with blue speed,
then unmorph and continue holding up to retain blue speed and break the bomb blocks.
detailNote: A momentum-conserving morph through the transition is not always required but usually makes the strat easier.
In many cases, pause buffering the morph can also be helpful.
devNote: FIXME: Add side platform Screw Attack jumps (without blue speed);
also add blue speed strats (side platform and otherwise) that break both sets of bomb blocks, falling down to the item.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
strats.note: Climb up 1 screen.
strats.devNote: Heat frames split into the actual climb and the setup in the adjacent room.

strats.name: Very Deep Stuck X-Ray Climb
note: Enter with G-mode direct, back up to between 1 and 6 pixels from the door transition, and activate X-ray to get very deep stuck in the door.
Climb up 1 screen, and perform a turnaround buffered spin-jump away from the door to trigger the transition, bypassing any lock on the door.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport Inside Wall
note: After teleporting, Samus should be standing inside the wall.
Retract Grapple by pressing up, which will pull Samus down and right.
Hold right, and release Grapple while still holding right.
Perform a turn-around spin jump (to the left).
Then morph and roll out to the right.

strats.name: G-Mode, Screw Attack
strats.note: Screw Attack through the bomb blocks before exiting G-mode above.

strats.name: Temporary Blue (Come In With Temporary Blue)
Temporary Blue (Come In Shinecharging)
devNote: If the previous room is heated and canXRayCancelShinecharge is not an option, then this strat saves heat frames compared to waiting out the shinecharge frames in the other room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, End Shinecharged (Temporary Blue)
strats.note: Store the shinecharge just before the door transition, so that Samus slides off the ledge, to gain a temporary blue state to break the blocks.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, End Shinecharged (Screw Attack)
G-Mode, Screw Attack
strats.note: Screw Attack through the bomb blocks before exiting G-mode below.

strats.name: Transition Speedy Jump with Bombs
strats.note: Run in the adjacent room and jump through the door, to place a Bomb to break the top bomb blocks.

strats.name: Transition Speedy Jump with Bombs (Tricky Dash Jump)
strats.note: Run in the adjacent room and jump through the door, to place a Bomb to break the top bomb blocks.

strats.name: Cross Room Blue Speed Jump with Hi-Jump
note: Jump into the room with blue speed, morphing and unmorphing to clear Samus' horizontal momentum while retaining blue.
Use the blue to break the right-most bomb blocks above, then fall down.

strats.name: Side Platform Blue Speed Jump

note: This applies to Lava Dive Room.
detailNote: To get enough height, it is suggested to do a double-stutter 3-tap with an early third tap.

note: This applies to Draygon's Room.
Jump into the room with blue speed, morphing and unmorphing to clear Samus' horizontal momentum while retaining blue.
Use the blue to break the right-most bomb blocks above, then fall down.
detailNote: A momentum-conserving morph through the transition is not always required but usually makes the strat easier.
In many cases, pause buffering the morph can also be helpful.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Bomb the Lower Blocks
strats.note: Bomb the blocks before exiting G-mode and jumping through.
devNote: FIXME: If Bombs are available (vs. Power Bombs), it's not necessary to break all the bottom blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Bomb the Upper Blocks
strats.note: Bomb the upper blocks before exiting G-mode near the lower bomb blocks.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Power Bomb the Upper Blocks, Door Frame Jump
note: Bomb the upper blocks before exiting G-mode near the lower bomb blocks.
It is possible to fall back onto the door shell with artificial morph, then use Spring Ball to place a Power Bomb high enough.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Bomb All Blocks
strats.note: Bomb all the blocks before exiting G-mode near the lower bomb blocks.
devNote: FIXME: If Bombs are available (vs. Power Bombs), it's not necessary to break all the bottom blocks.

strats.name: Direct G-Mode Morph, Bomb All Blocks, Door Frame Jump
note: Bomb all the blocks before exiting G-mode near the lower bomb blocks.
It is possible to fall back onto the door shell with artificial morph, then use Spring Ball to place a Power Bomb high enough.
devNote: FIXME: If Bombs are available (vs. Power Bombs), it's not necessary to break all the bottom blocks.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Temporary Blue)
note: Press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.
Maintain the temporary blue state to break through the blocks at the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Temporary Blue)
note: Press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.
Maintain the temporary blue state to break through the blocks at the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Full Runway, Screw Attack)
G-Mode, Screw Attack
strats.note: Screw Attack through the bomb blocks before exiting G-mode below.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Wall Jump)
note: Press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Reset Fall Speed)
note: Press down somewhat precisely to gain the shinecharge while breaking the bomb block.
Then morph, roll off the edge, and unmorph near the door to shoot it open.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark
note: Press down somewhat precisely to gain the shinecharge while breaking the bomb block.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave With Spark (Full Runway, Screw Attack)
Come In Shinecharging, Leave Shinecharged (Full Runway, Screw Attack, Wall Jump)
Super Sink
note: Enter the room with a super sink, in order to clip down to the space below.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph, Bomb the Blocks
strats.note: Bomb the blocks before exiting G-mode and jumping through.

strats.name: Temporary Blue (Full Runway)
strats.note: This expects the more controlled Temporary Blue to fall though the blocks, not storing a shinecharge on the first breakable block.
devNote: A significant amount of heat frames are implicit in the entrance condition.

strats.name: Temporary Blue (Short Runway)
strats.note: This expects the more controlled Temporary Blue to fall though the blocks, not storing a shinecharge on the first breakable block.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, End Shinecharged (Temporary Blue)
note: Press down precisely to gain the shinecharge while sliding off the ledge.
Maintain the temporary blue state to break through the blocks at the bottom of the room.
Reach the item while still having a shinecharge.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharging, End Shinecharged (Full Runway, Screw Attack)
note: Store a shinecharge then use Screw Attack to break through the bomb blocks down to the item location.
Reach the item while still having a shinecharge.
Doing a moonfall can save a few frames.
strats.devNote: Storing the shinecharge on the left side of the runway takes fine control over shinecharge spacing, but that is ok at this difficulty.

strats.name: Come In Shinecharged, End Shinecharged (Screw Attack)
note: Enter with a shinecharge, and use Screw Attack to break the bomb blocks and descend quickly.
Reach the item while still having a shinecharge.
Doing a moonfall can save a few frames.

strats.name: G-Mode, Screw Attack
strats.note: Screw Attack through the bomb blocks before exiting G-mode below.

strats.name: Stored Moonfall Clip
note: Moonfall to clip through the Bomb blocks to the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Come in Getting Blue Speed
strats.devNote: FIXME: Running in is not required. Entering the room with canBlueSpaceJump could work, for example.

strats.name: G-Mode, Screw Attack
strats.note: Screw Attack through the bomb blocks before exiting G-mode below.

strats.name: Grapple Teleport Extension Clip
note: After teleporting, as Samus swings to the right, begin holding down to extend Grapple just as Samus is slightly right of vertical.
Samus should swing back left and get stuck on the floor one tile to the right of the Grapple attachment point.
Release Grapple and Samus will clip through the floor.

strats.name: Stored Moonfall Clip
note: Moonfall to clip through the Bomb blocks
Break spin with Shot or Angle Aim to avoid clipping all the way to the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Start Shinecharged, Shinespark
strats.note: Diagonally shinespark towards the middle door.

strats.name: Use Flash Suit
strats.note: Diagonally shinespark towards the middle door.

strats.name: Start Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (Wall Jump)
Start Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump, Bottom Position)
Start Shinecharged, Leave With Spark (HiJump, Top Position)
IBJ
devNote: This assumes the bottom bomb blocks are completely broken,
making it necessary to start the IBJ from the bottom of the room.

strats.name: IBJ to Break the Top Blocks
strats.note: This expects that Samus falls down afterwards.
devNote: This assumes the bottom bomb blocks are completely broken,
making it necessary to start the IBJ from the bottom of the room.

strats.name: Power Bomb to Break the Top Blocks
devNote: FIXME: This doesn't quite break the blocks above, but going up after has more requirements.
The canTrivialMidAirMorph could be avoided by using Spring Ball on entry or from the doorsill.

strats.name: IBJ to Break the Top Blocks
strats.note: This expects that Samus falls down afterwards.
devNote: This assumes the lower bomb blocks are not completely broken (due to having used a Power Bomb).

strats.name: Space Bombs
devNote: FIXME: add strats that enter spinning from node 2 and use Space Jump + Bombs to break the blocks;
consider both air and water entry.

strats.name: Springwall with Bombs
strats.note: Use a Springwall to get up to the bomb blocks, to break them with a bomb.

notables.name: Transition Screw Jump
notables.note: Run through the doorway with enough momentum to break the bomb blocks with Screw.

notables.name: Transition Speedy Jump with Bombs
notables.note: Run in the adjacent room and jump through the door, to place a Bomb to break the obstacle.

notables.name: Doorway CWJ
notables.note: Position Samus in the doorway a few pixels from the edge. Dashing stationary spinjump into a delayed CWJ and hopefully catch the upper ledge with a walljump.

notables.name: Grapple Teleport Inside Wall
note: After teleporting, Samus should be standing inside the wall.
Retract Grapple by pressing up, which will pull Samus down and right.
Hold right, and release Grapple while still holding right.
Perform a turn-around spin jump (to the left).
Then morph and roll out to the right.
